thread.title: Associa EMB Management Hires Tammy Bryar as New Branch President

author: cnbc.com
title: Associa EMB Management Hires Tammy Bryar as New Branch President
text:
Bellevue, WA, March 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Associa EMB Management announces the recent hiring of Tammy Bryar as the new branch president.
Ms. Bryar has more than 28 years of property management experience having held positions such as leasing specialist, property manager, and regional manager. After 10 years in the industry, Ms. Bryar was recruited to be the regional vice president of a national management company, where she oversaw the operations of more than 3,000 units and managed a team of 85 employees including regional managers and district managers. In her new role with Associa, Ms. Bryar will focus on branch operations, client retention, business development and expanding the EMB footprint.
“Tammy has a passion for mentoring her team and has a unique ability to inspire and retain the best and brightest people in the industry,” stated George Zalitis, Associa senior vice president, western region. “Tammy strives to provide excellent customer service with a genuine approach and under her leadership EMB Management will continue to expand its community reach.”
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
